SECTION_INTRO.A: WOM - “Worth One Minute” is a general-purpose rewarding platform based on a voucher exchange system. Many actions and activities made by individuals have an intrinsic social value, an effect known as “positive externalities” in economics. WOM aims to recognize all those actions that are a socially valuable contribution to a common goal and reward the time people dedicate to them by generating social digital vouchers. WOM vouchers reward every minute of a social effort.
SECTION_INTRO.B: The WOM platform is implemented and managed by DIGIT srl. DIGIT srl is a spin-off of the University of Urbino that aims to create social value through digital awareness. It is founded on the conviction that the core of technology, platforms and, software need to be in the interest of human people and society and that social and digital innovation are related. WOM is only one of the social projects of DIGIT srl.

SECTION_VOL.TITLE: Volunteers
SECTION_VOL.MESSAGE: By making socially valuable actions, every user gains WOM and becomes a Volunteer. Volunteers can manage their WOM vouchers by a mobile app, the “WOM Pocket”. They can install it on their device. The application allows volunteers to gather their vouchers, store them, and spend them.

SECTION_MERCH.TITLE: Merchant
SECTION_MERCH.MESSAGE: Local shops can take part in the project by becoming Merchants. Merchants are system components that can create payment instances. They can accept WOM vouchers in exchange for services and discounts. Merchants use a different application, the “WOM POS”, or a custom integration software. These software components allow merchants to create new transactions, applying filters to collected WOM vouchers.

SECTION_INSTR.TITLE: Instrument
SECTION_INSTR.MESSAGE: Instruments are owners of social activities or an initiative with a social aim recognized by the platform. Instruments allow volunteers to take social actions. Owners of this type of activity, such as non-profit organizations, associations, or private individuals, may contact info@wom.social to be evaluated by the platform’s ethical committee and added to the list of WOM Instruments that can generate vouchers and reward contributors.

SECTION_REG.TITLE: Registry
SECTION_REG.MESSAGE: The Registry is the central entity that generates WOMs requested by an Instrument, it verifies their authenticity when they are used by a Merchant and it makes sure they can't be duplicated or used twice.

SECTION_TECH.TITLE: Technical
SECTION_TECH.MESSAGE: WOM is an open technology provided as open source software, released under the MIT license. It is developed in the open on GitHub, take a look.

SECTION_CONTACT.TITLE: Stay in touch! 📫
SECTION_CONTACT.MESSAGE: To develop new WOM integrations, POS connectors, or any other inquiry, please contact info@wom.social.

SECTION_A.A: WOM stands for Worth One Minute and is a general-purpose rewarding platform based on a voucher exchange system that rewards the positive impact of actions and activities done by people that contribute to a common good.
SECTION_A.B: Many actions have an intrinsic social value, an effect known as “positive externalities” in economics. WOM recognizes the impact of those actions and provides a tool to reward these positive externalities by issuing WOMs.

SECTION_A_2.TITLE: What are WOMs
SECTION_A_2.A: WOMs are digital vouchers designed to recognize the value of actions having such a positive effect. Each WOM voucher rewards one minute of socially-valuable effort performed by an individual.
SECTION_A_2.B: The WOMs vouchers are anonymous. The only data they store is related to their social purpose and where and when they generate. WOM vouchers do not have value in “real” fiat money. They are proof of a socially-valuable effort that an individual contributed towards a shared cause.
SECTION_A_2.C: The Registry manages the voucher exchange and keeps track of the creation and consumption of WOMs. The WOM platform is a centralized system. The Registry represents the authority that manages the exchange of cryptographic keys (which allow the secure exchange of information) and verifies that vouchers are earned and spent correctly. The Registry does not store the identity of users and their data. WOM vouchers are anonymous, and their use is not tracked.

SECTION_B.TITLE: How do I earn WOMs?
SECTION_B.A: WOM vouchers are gained by voluntarily performing socially-valuable work. Each minute of effort is worth one WOM. For the generation of WOM, the performed activity must be officially recognized by the WOM platform.
SECTION_B.B: To be recognized, activity or initiative must be evaluated as socially valuable and thus approved by the WOM platform ethical committee.

SECTION_C.TITLE: How do I use my WOMs?
SECTION_C.A: Business owners, shopkeepers, public entities, or any other private citizen (generically called Merchants) may freely decide to provide goods, services, or discounts to owners of WOM vouchers. To do so, they create a WOM payment that allows them to choose which kind of effort to reward: WOM vouchers can be filtered by purpose, location, and time. Goods, services, and discounts can be determined freely by the Merchant.

SECTION_A.A: Questa sezione è dedicata a WOM per Urbino, il progetto che da maggio 2022 è stato avviato nella città di Urbino. WOM per Urbino è la prima forma di sperimentazione del progetto WOM. La scelta di Urbino come prima città ad utilizzare WOM deriva dalla collaborazione di DIGIT srl, Università di Urbino e Città di Urbino, che ha concesso il suo patrocinio.
SECTION_A.B: Il progetto è stato lanciato dal 4 maggio 2022 tramite una conferenza stampa (per rivedere la conferenza Clicca qui). Attualmente i cittadini, gli studenti e i turisti hanno varie possibilità di ottenere WOM e di utilizzarli per ottenere sconti nei negozi convenzionati al progetto.

SECTION_A.TITLE: How does it work for users?
SECTION_A.A: Many actions and activities done by an individual contribute to a common good and have an intrinsic social value. By making those socially valuable actions, every user gains WOMs and becomes a Volunteer. Volunteers can use WOM vouchers to obtain services or goods provided by Merchants. Every Volunteer can collect all the vouchers gained on the app "WOM Pocket".

SECTION_B.TITLE: Pocket
SECTION_B.A: Volunteers can manage their WOM vouchers by a mobile app, the "WOM Pocket". This app allows users to collect their earned WOM vouchers, keep them (as if they were in a virtual “wallet”) and spend their vouchers. The WOM platform has no cost for the Volunteers and they can freely download the Pocket app from the Android and iOS stores.

SECTION_A.TITLE: Where do i spend my WOMs? How can I reward socially useful actions with WOMs?
SECTION_A.A: Merchants are system components that can create payment instances. They can accept WOM vouchers in exchange for the services and discounts they offer. Merchants can choose what type of vouchers they accept. They can choose: vouchers generated only for a given purpose (thus promoting that social purpose), those generated in a given geographical area (thus encouraging social actions in their reality territorial), or those generated in a defined time interval. The payment instances do not involve money exchanges but only discounts and gratuities.
SECTION_A.B: By accepting specific types of WOM vouchers, Merchants can indirectly contribute to a social campaign, encouraging citizens to contribute to the shared goal with their voluntary efforts. Also, merchants can increase their visibility to the community working towards the shared goal.
SECTION_A.C: Want to be a merchant? Sign in here

SECTION_B.TITLE: POS
SECTION_B.A: The tool Merchants can use to accept WOM payment is the app “WOM POS” (Point of Sale) or a custom integration software. These software components allow merchants to create new transactions, applying filters to collected WOM vouchers.
SECTION_B.B: The WOM platform has no cost for the Merchant that wants to use it anonymously. Merchants can freely download the app POS from the Android and iOS stores. There are no transaction costs. If Merchants want to make their offers more visible and have periodic reports of the social value they have helped to generate, they can select paid services.

SECTION_A.TITLE: How can I generate WOMs?
SECTION_A.A: Instruments are system components recognized by the WOM platform and approved by an ethical committee. They can generate vouchers and reward contributors. All owners of social activity or an initiative that allows volunteers to take social action can become Instruments and add to the list of WOM Instruments.
SECTION_A.B: Each Instrument allows the pursuit of one of the social objectives identified by the WOM platform (for example, initiatives for public health, activities for the defense of social rights or the protection of the artistic and cultural heritage, etc.). These objectives are called aims.
SECTION_A.C: The placing on the platform of new Instruments for the release of WOMs has costs related to the review process by the ethics and technical committees, the development of the connectors, and the maintenance of the WOM generation service.

TERMS_CONDITIONS.MAIN_TEXT:
Welcome to the WOM platform!

 The following is in italian language only.  

I termini e le condizioni seguenti indicano regole e normative per l’utilizzo del sito di DIGIT srl, all’indirizzo https://wom.social.

Accedendo a questo sito, Lei accetta i termini e le condizioni seguenti. Le chiediamo di non continuare a registrarti al servizio WOM nel caso in cui non fosse d’accordo con tutti i termini e le condizioni in questa pagina.

Licenza:

A meno che indicato altrimenti, DIGIT srl e/o gli affiliati con licenza detengono i diritti di proprietà intellettuale per tutto il materiale su WOM. Tutti i diritti di proprietà intellettuale sono riservati. 

Il presente accordo ha inizio dalla data di registrazione.

Responsabilità sui contenuti:

Non possiamo essere ritenuti responsabili per i contenuti presenti sul Suo sito. Accetta di proteggerci e difenderci da qualsiasi azione legale proveniente dal Suo sito. Non devono essere aggiunti collegamenti sul Suo sito che potrebbero essere interpretati come calunniosi, osceni, criminali o che infrangono, violano o suggeriscono la violazione di diritti di terzi.

Diritti riservati:

Ci riserviamo il diritto di richiedere la rimozione di tutti i collegamenti o di un collegamento specifico al nostro sito. Deve approvare immediatamente la richiesta di rimozione dei collegamenti. Ci riserviamo il diritto di modificare termini e condizioni, oltre che politica di collegamento in qualsiasi momento. Continuando a usare il nostro sito, accetta di essere vincolato dai presenti termini e condizioni.

Rimozione di collegamenti dal nostro sito:

Nel caso in cui un collegamento sul nostro sito sia offensivo per qualsiasi motivo, può contattarci e informarci in qualsiasi momento. Considereremo le richieste di rimozione dei collegamenti, tuttavia non siamo obbligati a completare la rimozione o rispondere direttamente.

Non garantiamo l’accuratezza delle informazioni presenti sul sito. Non garantiamo che le informazioni siano complete o precise, né promettiamo di assicurare che il sito resti disponibile o che il materiale sul sito venga costantemente aggiornato.

Esclusione di responsabilità:

Nella misura massima consentita dalla legge, escludiamo ogni rappresentanza, garanzia e condizione correlata al nostro sito e all’uso dello stesso. 

Le limitazioni e i divieti di responsabilità indicati in questa sezione e in altre parti di questa esclusione di responsabilità: (a) sono soggetti al paragrafo precedente; (b) governano tutte le responsabilità correlate a questa esclusione di responsabilità, incluse quelle correlate a contratto, torto o violazione di obblighi normativi.

Se sito, informazioni e servizi vengono forniti gratuitamente, non possiamo essere ritenuti responsabili per perdite o danni di qualsiasi natura.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: PRIVACY POLICIES
OVERVIEW.MAIN_CONTENT: You can find all the privacy policies for the WOM Platform and its applications in the side menu.

STEPCOUNTER.TITLE: ‘WOM Stepcounter’ privacy policy
CONTENT: This privacy policy is conform to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GRPD”) 2016/679 and national data protection laws in Italy. It contains all information about the collection and treatment of data by the “WOM Stepcounter” application (from now “the app”).
The app enables the conversion of effort towards personal health and fitness into anonymous vouchers, through the “WOM Platform”.
1. Data controller

The data controller, that is the entity that determines the purposes and the means of the processing of personal data, is DIGIT s.r.l., with registered address Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi 66, 61029, Urbino (PU).
Digit s.r.l. is a spin-off of Università degli Studi di Urbino “Carlo Bo” (University of Urbino, Italy).
2. Data subject to processing

The app locally collects and locally processes data of the user’s fitness activities, such as they are exposed by the platform on which the app is installed by the user (Google Fitness for Android, Apple Healthkit for iOS).
The app does not provide user registration, thus other personal information is never collected.
3. Purpose of processing

The project enables territorial and local event marketing, through novel participation and rewarding mechanisms. The app recognizes the value of all those actions that have an intrinsic social value, such as fitness activities. These informations are collected and stored locally on the user’s device and they are never transmitted to any server nor shared with third parties.
4. Legal basis of the processing

The legal basis of data processing is provided by the freely expressed consent of the user, when installing and opening the app on their smartphone. The app provides information about the means and purposes of data processing and then asks for user permission, which is explicitly granted. Consent is provided exclusively for the purposes expressed at point 3 of this document.
5. Means of data collection

After installing and starting the app on the user’s device, the app will start collection information about the user’s fitness activities through the application programming interfaces provided by Google Fitness or Apple Healthkit, respectively on Android and iOS.
6. Duration of data storage
Data is collected only as long as the application is installed on the user’s device. Uninstalling the app will remove all collected data.
7. Means of processing and transmission of data

Data collected by the app is stored exclusively on the user’s device (using local data storage). The data stored is used to provide the user with a diary of their activities. Data is never transmitted.
8. Third parties
Data collected on the device’s memory (local data storage) is never transmitted to third parties.
9. Rights of the data subject
According to article 15 and following of the GDPR, the user has the following rights:
<ul>
• obtain confirmation of the existence of their personal data, accessing it and obtaining a copy of it (right of access);
• update, modify and/or correct their personal data (diritto di rectification);
• ask the removal or restriction of data processing, as determined by the GDPR (right of cancellation e right to restriction of the processing);
• oppose the processing, as determined by the GDPR (right to object),
• obtain a copy of the data in a common structured format and ask for it to be transmitted to a different Data controller, if technically feasible (right to portability<).
The user also has the right of complaint to the supervisory authorities.
To exercise these rights, the user may contact the following e-mail address: info@digit.srl or write to the following address:

DIGIT s.r.l.
Corso Giuseppe Garibaldi, 66
61029, Urbino (PU)
c.a. Responsabile della protezione dati personali
10. Updates to the privacy policy
This document may be updated in the future. Refer to the last update date at the bottom of the document.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: List of applications for gaining WOMs
OVERVIEW.MAIN_CONTENT:
WOM vouchers can be earned by voluntarily doing a socially useful action. For a WOM to be generated, the activity has to be formally acknowledged by the WOM platform.
Volounteers can obtain WOMs through the use of specific applications that recognize the social value of their actions
Check out the list of the applications in the side menu!

STEPCOUNTER.TITLE: WOM Stepcounter
STEPCOUNTER.MAIN_CONTENT:
Keep track of the steps you take with WOM StepCounter, an app that rewards you for the things you do in your daily life!

Thanks to WOM StepCounter you will be able to convert your steps into digital vouchers, that reward social effort. You will receive vouchers if you keep track of more than 3.000 steps per day.

UNIVERSITIES.TITLE: Universities
UNIVERSITIES.MAIN_CONTENT:
WOM is a project that acknowledges actions that have an intrinsic social value, and exactly because of this it recognizes the effort of each univeristy student in passing their exams Check out which universities will let you earn WOMs for each successful exam.
Click on the link of each university for more information:

AWORLD.TITLE: AWorld
AWORLD.MAIN_CONTENT:
AWorld is an App that promotes sustainable living in the modern world.
DIGIT SRL has teamed up with AWorld to convert your sustainable living actions into WOMs. Check out the following link for more information:

BALANCE.TITLE: Balance - Postural Stability
BALANCE.MAIN_CONTENT:
Balance - Postural Stability© is an application developed by researchers at the University of Urbino to evaluate your stability by investigating your stabilometric indices with just your smartphone.
Measure your postural stability every day to earn WOMs!
You can start collecting WOMs after doing a measurement in 2 different days.

CODYMAZE.TITLE: CodyMaze
CODYMAZE.MAIN_CONTENT:
An open-air chessboard of 25 blocks in which the students will move around like robots guided by the instructions that will appear gradually on the smartphone.
A labyrinth that is never the same, which appears different to each player and changes at each entry.
How to get out of it? By putting into practice the basic principles of coding that you assimilate even while playing!
Earn WOMs by having fun!
